lead_paragraph: Mr. Temer told the United Nations General Assembly that the proceeding showed “absolute respect for the constitutional order,” but he declined to address corruption scandals.
snippet: Mr. Temer told the United Nations General Assembly that the proceeding showed “absolute respect for the constitutional order,” but he declined to address corruption scandals....

headline.main: Brazil’s New President, Michel Temer, Defends Impeachment of Dilma Rousseff
